afterGetSession
template.value: def afterGetSession(self, mvcsession): '''After getting session''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() $END$ return mvcsession

template.name: afterInitData
template.value: def afterInitData(self, mvcsession): '''After initializing data''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() dataset= mvcsession.entryDataset fields = dataset.FieldsAsDict() $END$ dataset.AdjustRecord(fields) return mvcsession

finalizeView
template.value: def finalizeView(self, mvcsession): '''Finalize the program before closing it''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() $END$ return mvcsession
template.description: Finalize the program before closing it

template.name: initializeData
template.value: def initializeData(self, mvcsession): '''Initializing data''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() dataset= mvcsession.entryDataset params = mvcsession.paramDataset.FieldsAsDict() $END$ dataset.AdjustRecord(params) return mvcsession

template.name: initializeParam
template.value: def initializeParam(self, mvcsession, query): '''Initialize parameters''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() dataset= mvcsession.paramDataset params = dataset.FieldsAsDict() $END$ dataset.AdjustRecord(params) return query

template.name: initView
lookupView
template.description: Define lookup metadata for specified field

template.name: openView
template.value: def openView(self, mvcsession): '''Prepare the data for browsing mode''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() dataset= mvcsession.listDataset $END$ return mvcsession
template.description: Prepare the data for browsing mode

template.name: postData
template.value: def postData(self, mvcsession): '''Post data into persistent storage''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() dataset= mvcsession.entryDataset $END$ return mvcsession

template.name: printData
template.value: def printData(self, mvcsession): '''Return the unique report ID for printing purpose''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() ret = $END$ return ret
template.description: Return the unique report ID for printing purpose

template.name: retrieveData
template.value: def retrieveData(self, mvcsession): '''Retrieve data for editing mode''' proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() dataset= mvcsession.entryDataset $END$ return mvcsession

template.name: synchronizeData
template.value: def synchronizeData(self, mvcsession, fieldName, fieldType): '''Synchronize data retrieved from user input''' dataset = mvcsession.entryDataset if fieldType == MVCTypeField else \ mvcsession.paramDataset fields = dataset.FieldsAsDict() proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() if (fieldName == '$END$'): pass dataset.AdjustRecord(fields) return mvcsession
template.description: Synchronize data retrieved from user input

template.name: validateData
template.value: def validateData(self, mvcsession): '''Validate date retrieved from user input before storing it into persistent storage''' dataset= mvcsession.entryDataset fields = dataset.FieldsAsDict() proxy = self.getBusinessObjectProxy() $END$ return mvcsession
template.description: Validate date retrieved from user input before storing it into persistent storage

template.name: onOpenView
template.value: def onOpenView(self, fields): '''Event trigered when retrieving list of data''' $END$ return fields
template.description: Event trigered when retrieving list of data
